gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of all webhooks to monitor their current status and configurations.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all configured webhooks with their details.

gold.user: Developer creating a new webhook to trigger on specific events in the application.
gold.ideal: Creates a new webhook and returns the details of the created webhook.

gold.user: Admin user updating multiple webhooks to change their configurations for better performance.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified webhooks and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Admin user deleting obsolete webhooks that are no longer needed.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified webhooks and confirms the deletion.

gold.user: User checking the details of a specific webhook to ensure it is set up correctly.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified webhook.

gold.user: Developer modifying an existing webhook to adjust its trigger conditions.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified webhook and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Admin user removing a specific webhook that is no longer relevant to the current application workflow.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified webhook and confirms the deletion.
